topic: How to Automate Actions at The Design Space

definition.text: Write a summary for this topic page.

paragraphs.text: Left click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode. Then you can use doscs.save to save your changes and app.contribute to send it to the main repository.
